Hands down the best Chinese food I've had in Albany. Try the Pork Soup Dumplings!  It's humble appearance is a testiment to how serious they take the quality of the food.

Great selection, great value, great service. I have never been let down by Ocean Palace and I don't I ever will.

Does this place have delivery ?  Sounds really good and would love to try it today ???
Edit : 12/16/19 Okay I tried the place now and when i got there it was 1 minute past the time for the lunch special there wasnt anyone in there and the guy wouldnt give me the special price so I came back another day when I could get it. I got chicken with mushroom and the mushrooms were the big black mushrooms I am not a fan of the way they taste. 
I want to give this place another try though since all the reviews make it sound so tasty hopefully I will find something I LOVE :)
I liked the food but I sometimes vomited blood.

This is probably the best Chinese food I've ever had. The restaurant is an unassuming little hole in the wall, but it is a hidden treasure. The menu has a lot to choose from, including some items that Americans might find strange, which I consider a mark of authenticity. As the name suggests, there are a lot of seafood options on the menu. This is a fine place to either eat in or take out; the atmosphere is pleasant. For those who eat in, there is a large round table where groups can sit down for dim sum. Dine-in customers also get hot oolong tea, which may be the best hot tea I've ever had in a Chinese restaurant. The fact that this place is open late is also a plus. I recommend Ocean Palace to all my friends who ask what a good Chinese restaurant in Albany is.
The roast pork lo mein is so delicious. The fried rice is authentic and tasty. I really enjoyed my food

name: Oaxaquena Triqui
address: 77 N Lake Ave, Albany, NY 12206, USA
reviews: Great food, great and friendly service. And very affordable, especially on Tuesdays for Tacos! 3 tacos for only $6! That's something you can't pass on!

Amazing food and service. Highly recommend the tacos the best I ever had. Only authentic Mexican restaurant in Albany, it was definitely shown in the food. Staff is very nice and friendly. Definitely going back soon.
The most authentic place in Albany! The family that owns it is so sweet, the food is amazing, the restaurant has great ambience. One of my top 10 favorite places to eat!

I love this place! The food is fresh, delicious and authentic. Everything I've tried has hit the spot. The owners are very friendly and sweet. Very family friendly restaurant, not very formal. There's also a section up front with imported goods. I highly recommend this place!
Small but very authentic mexican food. Grocery at front and food at back. Very nice food. Nice people. Just water was not good. Take ur own water to drink or use bottled water

name: The Orchard Tavern
address: 68 N Manning Blvd, Albany, NY 12206, USA
reviews: First off let me say that I have ordered food from here before and haven't had any complaints. Me and my girlfriend ordered a couple salads a chef and a cobb. Starting with the chef. 90% iceberg lettuce and croutons. Almost no meat or cheese. Cobb about 80% iceberg lettuce. Even on the menu it lists the cobb as fresh GREENS chicken bacon egg and tomato. Soggy bacon and rubbery chicken.
The boneless wings are really good. They seem to have black pepper so even if you like your wings hot, try the medium first.
First table at 1130.  Never got our food.  Took it to go.  Had to get back to work.  The 3 booths in the bar area all had food and then came after us.
Very friendly staff, the French fries were so crispy and tastes great. The birthday wing special was really nice too!

Classic Albany restaurant.  Pizza as good as I remember. The new owner Chris introduced himself and told us about the changes that will make the place even better.   The only complaint is the draft beer prices are as high.  For a old classic place, there should be lower.

name: Jonathan's Pizza
address: 31 N Pearl St, Albany, NY 12207, USA
reviews: The food is delicious and the staff made us feel very welcomed and accommodated me even though I'm in a  wheelchair. I will definitely go there again.

Jonathan's is the best!!  Everything they make is delicious! Staff is always pleasant and helpful. I will always be assured of a tasty meal when I order from them. Thank you Jonathan's for keeping the customer #1.
Visited here when I was in Albany for training. Food and service was great!
Awesome food good prices quick service
Awesome tasty food. Good drinks great Pizza!  So it's not updated.   So what!  It's really good food and if you want crispy you get crispy!   If you don't want greasy suck it!  Go to Subway.

name: Emmanuel Thai Restaurant
reviews: The best food, verygood not junk food Its healthy  lot of flavors
Soooo good! Got the red curry with pork, came out fast and was delicious! Service was super friendly and super quick! Definitely going back!!

Great food, Great service! If you want to discover new places for food, the experience is worth having! I’ve ordered pineapple fried rice and red curry lunch! I’d say must try both if you like a little bit of spicy food. Overall good experience.
The pineapple curry was amazing! I am highly recommend this dish! Omg so authentic!
Really great Pad Thai (medium) and the Pot Stickers have a tasty sauce they come with. A+ food

name: Juniors Bar and Grill
reviews: Delicioso! Simply put. Have only been there a couple times but they have great food in good portions for a decent price. I recommend the BBQ Chicken salad. Already ate HALF before I even took the photo.
Great place for drinks, wings, laughter and sports! I enjoyed my time there!! Highly recommended fam.

I used to go to Junior's all the time... back in the day. This was my first time back in a little over a year and it has changed. It appears that some updates have been made and the menu has changed a bit.
We ordered mozzarella with raspberry sauce. It came out with marinara but when we told the waitress she returned fairly quickly with the raspberry sauce. We also ordered the Harvest Salad. It used to be called the Autumn Harvest Salad and it used to come with chicken on it. It was good but I was surprised when it came out without chicken. We also ordered the boneless moonshine wings. The boneless wings were good but they were a bit small and I'm not convinced the price is in alignment with the quantity. Overall it was pretty good.

The food and service are always GREAT!!!  The Manger and the staff are top notch.  Great environment coupled with the food and service.... Can't go wrong.  Give it a try and you'll be glad that you did.  Don't leave without trying to peanut butter whiskey.... Awesome
Friendly and quick staff. Ordered for take -out and thenfoid was hot. Moonshine wings have a mustard base sauce which is pretty good.

name: Healthy On Lark
reviews: Cute juice bar and veggie restaurant. Tiny and mighty with Spirit and beautiful decor! Hours very variable check ahead and budget to visit and get a nice healthy juice ! I loved it!
Friendly, clean, delicious.  Vegan breakfast burrito is fantastic, as soba noodle stir fry💖
This place is a gem. The place is tiny and cozy and every meal I have had on the menu you can tell is made fresh and with care. The service is fantastic and they have many vegetarian/vegans options!
This place offers a great variety of vegetarian dishes. Everything is freshly made with quality ingredients. Highly recommend.

This quaint, boutique-Colombian jaunt is easy to miss but will not be forgotten once you take a bite!  From Korean taco to Buffalo Cauliflower sandwich paired with their craft juices is out of this world!!!

name: The Local 217
address: 12 ½, Delaware Ave, Albany, NY 12210, USA
reviews: Awesome remodel with a more accessible bar and cool new seating. I haven't eaten yet, but the beer selection is amazing.
Great service and they make my favorite french fries around!
Best place for brunch in Albany hands down. Great atmosphere and beautiful deck. Went for brunch today Susie the owner is the best will be coming every Sunday.

It's a staple of Lark St night life. You go out have a few and then around midnight decide you want a breakfast sandwich and damnit if cafe 217 isn't gonna deliver it the best way possible. Love the staff, love the food, love the beer and wine selection. Great outing Everytime all the time.
Good diner like food. Great for a for late night food on the weekends.

name: El Patron
reviews: Went here on a whim and it was absolutely amazing. Super fast and friendly service. The food was out of this world. Prices for food and drinks are also very reasonable. We definitely will go there again.

Great place to have a delicious meal. This places looked small from outside but had lots of space inside. The entrance is on the side. The food was amazing, and the menu has so much to choose from. The service was great, and I would highly recommend it to others visiting the area. It was nice to have a reasonably priced dinner while visiting upstate NY.
Went for Happy Hour and got an AMAZING Strawberry Margarita for $5! The guacamole was fresh and delicious and the service was top-notch! I will definitely be visiting again soon!

Food was okay, I could tell it was microwaved because of the beans. Devil meat was not spicy, just had chipotle sauce. They give alot of chips and salsa which is nice. Decor and atmosphere is lively and beautiful. Might be one of the few Mexican places here so maybe go once for drinks and appetizer.

We were staying in Albany for the baseball hall of fame weekend and went here on Sunday after the induction ceremony and were totally impressed.  We're from Seattle and have oodles of Mexican joints. This is in our top 5. Margaritas by the pitchers are the way to go. My wife have the child rellenos with poblanos was excellent.  I had the chicken and beef
fajitas was enough for two and very good. Sarah our server was excellent and very sweet. 
If you got a hankering for Mexican,  the patron is a must!
